Use natural ventilation: Open windows and doors to allow fresh air to circulate and regulate the temperature in your home or office.
Use a portable fan: A portable fan can help circulate air and create a breeze, making the room feel cooler.
Use a space heater: If you only need to heat up a specific area, use a space heater to warm up the room.
Use a humidifier: Adding moisture to the air can help regulate temperature and make the air feel cooler.
Use ice packs: Place ice packs in strategic locations around the room to help cool down the air and regulate temperature.
